boardgame.name: Agents of SMERSH
boardgame.description: A STORYTELLING BOARD GAME SET IN THE 1970s COLD WAR ERA._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;SMERSH is a portmanteau of two Russian words that translates to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Death to Spies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; It operated as a counter-intelligence agency by the Red Army during the 1940s. Despite having had a large number of paid employees, little was known about the agency until recently when Russia opened their archives._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Agents of SMERSH is a cooperative Storytelling game that pits players as UN Secret Service Spies set in an alternate 1970s timeline against a newly formed and independent SMERSH. Agents of SMERSH includes custom dice to determine success or failure of encounters, and more strategic play from what is typically expected of a Storytelling board game. There are plenty of James Bond gadgets, guns, cars, pop references and detailed artwork - not to mention a touch of humor. The game features the artwork of George Patsouras (The Resistance _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Flash Point)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is able to accommodate play with either The Encounter Book, which contains over 1500 written encounters with a similar reaction matrix to Tales of the Arabian Nights - or played more simply with only encounter cards with shorter encounters and no matrix. The First Edition (2012) of the game came with the Encounter Cards as standard, and the Encounter Book as an optional add-on (although many copies did actually include the book). The Second Edition (2015) includes the Encounter Book as standard, with the Encounter Cards available to purchase from the publisher._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Thematic Board Game Nominee

I have an extra Kickstarter copy of Agents of SMERSH. The box was opened for the author to sign the Encounter Book so is not sealed. Shipping will be the actual cost of the USPS priority box. I live in Los Angeles (the South Bay area) and work in Irvine if you prefer a cash face-to-face delivery. Please ask any questions prior to making an offer.

Includes the big adventure book *and* all KS-exclusive content from the original Kickstarter campaign (http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/147552/agents-of...). I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m also selling the expansion with more KS-exclusives. You can save on shipping by buying them both at once. Opened and carefully played only once, everything is present and in pristine condition. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $12.35 for USPS with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). Be sure to check my other listings, I usually have multiple games up for sale at any time, and you pay actual shipping cost if you buy multiple games which will usually save you money. I pack my games carefully and have had no complaints or issues. I usually ship the next business day after receipt of payment. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). International shipping will be ACTUAL SHIPPING COST. For promo cards this is usually $3-$5. For card games and other small items that can fit into a DVD mailer, this is usually $10-$20. For larger items up to 64oz this is usually $35-$45. For items over 64oz that will fit into a medium flat-rate box (e.g. Agricola or Netrunner sized boxes) the cost is usually $60. Big and heavy items will likely cost $70 or more. Contact me BEFORE ORDERING if you have any questions about shipping.

This is a KickStarter version of Agents of Smersh in great shape. It includes the Book of Encounters that has been signed by Jason Maxwell as thanks for backing the KickStarter campaign. Extra secret agents and villians are included as well as special dice. All small bits are nicely organized in a plastic organizer to cut down on box clutter. The dice come in a fabulous red velvet bag. I have also printed off some color player aids from BGG and laminated one as well. These really add to the flow of the game and ease new players into the story. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested in a great story game, this is the version to get as the extras really add flavor to the tale. The box does have slight damage, but the components are perfect. Only played a few times.

1st edition Kickstarter version with all the promo characters and extras. Also includes the Kickstarter version of Swagmans hope. Box has some minor shelf wear but contents pristine. Buyer pays actual shipping costs. Original Illustrations by George Patsouras (The Resistance) - OVER 300 Cards (including Cards that come with The Book of Encounters) -Punchout tokens with character images in standees - Around 100 tokens - 5 Character Player Cards (6 WITH THE KICKSTARTER BONUS CHARACTER) - 4 Villain Henchmen mats that set near the main board - Main Villain Advancement Mat - 6 Custom made dice and Dice Bag used to draw dice blindly - Large Main Board - Custom Illustrated - Random Player tokens and pieces (Miniatures may be added if we go over our goals) - Optional Large Format O-Ring Bound Book of nearly 1500 written encounters (over 200 pages) - Cooperative Gameplay. 1-4 Players. Game length average 90 minutes. For a 4 player game using the book - you may need to add 30 to this estimate. KS Base game exclusive items: * 1 Henchman mat (Shadow) * 3 Character mats (Zyler, Dust Flanders, Dread Tod) * 3 Character tokens and 3 plastic standees * 1 Poker chip * 1 Travel die * 14 White cubes * 1 The Director_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Watchful Eye Promo Card * 1 Rules sheet Swagmans Hope KS Exclusive items: * 2 extra characters (Tilly and Mose) * The Gambler Henchmen * Secret Missions Deck * Revised 2.0 Rule book Does not include the written encounters deck from the base game.
